org.daisy.common.transform

Interface XMLTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SingleInSingleOutXMLTransformer

    public interface XMLTransformer
    Transform a number of input values to output values, at least one input or output being XML or convertable to/from XML. Note that this interface does not extend javax.xml.transform.Transformer.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  XMLTransformer.InputType 
      static interface  XMLTransformer.OutputType 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      Check that the expected inputs are present and are of the expected type.
      static Map<QName,OutputValue<?>> validateOutput(Map<QName,OutputValue<?>> output, Map<QName,XMLTransformer.OutputType> types)
      Check that the expected outputs are present and are of the expected type.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        Runnable transform(Map<QName,InputValue<?>> input,
                   Map<QName,OutputValue<?>> output)
        Parameters:
        input - Supplier of XDM values as a map from port name (QName) to InputValue object. If the map returns null for a certain key it means that port is not connected. If the map itself is null it means no input ports are connected.
        output - Consumer of XDM values as a map from port name (QName) to OutputValue object. If the map returns null for a certain key it means that port is not connected. If the map itself is null it means no output ports are connected.
        Returns:
        a Runnable that executes the transformation. Transformations can be run inside threads to keep the buffers between transformers small. If not run inside threads, the transformations must be executed in the correct order. Runnable.run() may throw a TransformerException if an input could not be read, the transformation failed, or an output could not be written.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an invalid input or output value was provided or if an input or output value is missing.

      • transform

        default Runnable transform(InputValue<?> input,
                           OutputValue<?> output)

      • validateInput

        static Map<QName,InputValue<?>> validateInput(Map<QName,InputValue<?>> input,

                                       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Check that the expected inputs are present and are of the expected type.
        Throws:

      • validateOutput

        static Map<QName,OutputValue<?>> validateOutput(Map<QName,OutputValue<?>> output,
                                                Map<QName,XMLTransformer.OutputType> types)
                                         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Check that the expected outputs are present and are of the expected type.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
